dmca.title: DMCA letter
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"), as it does not
identify (a) the copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed and (b)
the material that is claimed to be infringing, and information
reasonably sufficient to permit the The Planet to locate the said
material. 

 

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

 

 

________________________________

From: Marco Navalesi [mailto:navalesi@gmail.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, May 22, 2007 12:05 PM
To: Abuse
Cc: Response, Legal
Subject: DMCA letter

 

Dear Sir,
I'm writing you acting on behalf of Miss Marketa Belonoha 
http://www.marketa4you.com/
Legal info:
http://www.marketa4you.com/legal.html
Please see the attached DMCA letter about: 
http://www.marketabelonoha.org/

 


Thanks in advance for your cooperation.
Best Regards

Marco Navalesi
